scripts.staging:release: npm run build && npm run deploy:version:s3 && npm run deploy:next:s3 && npm run deploy:next:npm
scripts.release: npm run build && npm run deploy:version:s3 && npm run deploy:latest:s3 && npm run deploy:latest:npm
scripts.deploy:next:s3: aws s3 cp ./dist/webloader.js  s3://evolv-execution-plan-binaries/asset-manager/releases/next/webloader.js --acl public-read && aws s3 cp ./dist/webloader.min.js  s3://evolv-execution-plan-binaries/asset-manager/releases/next/webloader.min.js --acl public-read
scripts.deploy:version:s3: aws s3 cp ./dist/webloader.js  s3://evolv-execution-plan-binaries/asset-manager/releases/$SEM_VER/webloader.js --acl public-read && aws s3 cp ./dist/webloader.min.js  s3://evolv-execution-plan-binaries/asset-manager/releases/$SEM_VER/webloader.min.js --acl public-read
scripts.deploy:latest:s3: aws s3 cp ./dist/webloader.js  s3://evolv-execution-plan-binaries/asset-manager/releases/latest/webloader.js --acl public-read && aws s3 cp ./dist/webloader.min.js  s3://evolv-execution-plan-binaries/asset-manager/releases/latest/webloader.min.js --acl public-read
scripts.deploy:next:npm: npm version $SEM_VER --no-git-tag-version && npm publish --tag next --access public

hooks.pre-commit: npm test && npm run lint && npm run build
